Description: Body sherd (mended from three fragments) of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black (fired reddish); lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres above two white bands; exterior: part of double guilloche pattern in handle zone; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 261, no. 524)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0479) (phase 2)
